comment: God is not one-eyed. The one eye symbol is for Lucifer. That's why it's on the dollar bill.
amr:
# ::snt God is not one-eyed. The one eye symbol is for Lucifer. That's why it's on the dollar bill.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / one-eyed
            :polarity -
            :domain (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "God")))
      :snt2 (s / symbolize-01
            :ARG1 (e / eye
                  :quant 1)
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Lucifer")))
      :snt3 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (t / that)
            :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (ii / it)
                  :ARG2 (b2 / bill
                        :mod (d / dollar)))))
